title: The Aluminium age
creator_credit: Edwin Scragg, Comalco and Scope Films
brief_description: Describes the three steps involved in the making of aluminium; mining bauxite, separating the alumina from impurities, and finally the removal of the oxygen from alumina. The many and varied uses of aluminium are also illustrated. Music by Rory O’Donoghue and Grahame Bond. Suitable for middle secondary level.
